titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on sulfentrazone.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/15/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2008, the duty on N-[2,4-dichloro-5-[4-(difluoro methyl)-4,5-dihydro-3-methyl-5-oxo-1H-1,2,4-triazol-1-yl]phenyl]methanesulfona- mide (Sulfentrazone).
